Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I only used to give feedback on writing style, used teacher for the actual content.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI feedback had no emotional weight to it, and I could easily dismiss it if I disagreed. Human feedback could make me feel anything from proud to embarrassed to angry.
